means: 图皮—瓜拉尼人(南美印第安人)
[亦作 Tupi-Guaranian] 图皮—瓜拉尼语组

sentence.Network_en: The Wajapi of the Tupi - guarani cultural - linguistic group are indigenous to the northern Amazonian region.
sentence.Network_cn: 说图皮-瓜拉尼语的瓦杰皮人居住在亚马逊河北部地区.

sentence.Network_en: BG is a joint venture partner at Tupi.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国天然气集团是Tupi油田的合资开采伙伴.

sentence.Network_en: From the heart of America, this is the guarani spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴拉圭:来自美洲的心脏, 就是瓜拉尼人的精神.

means.word_mean: 1. a family of South American Indian languages

auth_sentence.content: There's Tupi again, mixed with Latin and Portuguese - the languages of the natives, the missionaries and the settlers.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's Tupi again, mixed with Latin and Portuguese - the languages of the natives, the missionaries and the settlers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's Tupi again, mixed with Latin and Portuguese - the languages of the natives, the missionaries and the settlers.

auth_sentence.content: He was part of a Guarani Kaiowa group that had returned to their ancestral land after being evicted by ranchers.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was part of a Guarani Kaiowa group that had returned to their ancestral land after being evicted by ranchers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was part of a Guarani Kaiowa group that had returned to their ancestral land after being evicted by ranchers.

auth_sentence.content: I was travelling in the company of the exceptional conservation organisation Guyra Paraguay guyra means bird in Guarani.
